abstract: Keeping Score column; Boston Celtics coach Brad Stevens' rebuilding project is finally taking hold; team is two spots from position that would qualify them for playoff berth, but they are 10th in Eastern Conference standings; 10 teams in East currently have winning records, compared to just 6 in West.
lead_paragraph: Boston is winning with depth, strategy and execution, but it is not in a playoff position in the Eastern Conference, which finally seems to have an overall edge over the West.

headline.main: Celtics Are on the Rise. The Problem: So Is the East.
headline.print_headline: Celtics Are on the Rise. The Problem: So Is the East.

snippet: Boston is winning with depth, strategy and execution, but it is not in a playoff position in the Eastern Conference, which finally seems to have an overall edge over the West.
